main_text: Delicious blueberries and whipped sweet cream yogurt layered with honey kissed granola clusters.
hero_txt: Delicious blueberries and whipped sweet cream yogurt layered with honey kissed granola clusters.
sub_txt: Delicious blueberries and whipped sweet cream yogurt layered with honey kissed granola clusters. A base of whole-milk vanilla yogurt (none of that tart Greek stuff here) is whipped until it’s smooth and decadently creamy. From there we add generous layers of honey-kissed granola clusters and blueberries bursting with fresh juice. Bottled and ready to tantalize your taste buds, this gourmet vape is perfect at breakfast or while snacking on the go, it’s delicious any time of the day.
popup_txt: Delicious blueberries and whipped sweet cream yogurt layered with honey kissed granola clusters. A base of whole-milk vanilla yogurt (none of that tart Greek stuff here) is whipped until it’s smooth and decadently creamy.

main_text: Parfait Strawberry delivers the deliciousness of fresh cut strawberries and honey granola clusters layered with sweet and creamy yogurt.
hero_txt: Parfait Strawberry delivers the deliciousness of fresh cut strawberries and honey granola clusters layered with sweet and creamy yogurt.
sub_txt: Parfait Strawberry delivers the deliciousness of fresh cut strawberries and honey granola clusters layered with sweet and creamy yogurt. A smooth whole-milk yogurt is whipped with vanilla to provide the perfectly balanced mellow creamy flavor. From that base we delicately layer granola clusters kissed with honey and fresh cut strawberries burst with juicy goodness. Bottled and ready to tantalize your taste buds, this gourmet vape is perfect at breakfast or while snacking on the go, it’s delicious any time of the day.
popup_txt: Parfait Strawberry delivers the deliciousness of fresh cut strawberries and honey granola clusters layered with sweet and creamy yogurt.

main_text: Crazy for the Killer Kustard Blueberry. Enjoy a pinch of ripe blueberry sweetness, complemented by our rich vanilla custard
hero_txt: Crazy for the Killer Kustard Blueberry. Enjoy a pinch of ripe blueberry sweetness, complemented by our rich vanilla custard
sub_txt: Vapetasia presents Blueberry Killer Kustard E-Liquid! Available in 60ml bottles, this blueberry custard elquid is pure bliss! If you are searching for the smoothest, richest and most delicious custard on the planet with that perfect kiss of blueberry… look no further!
popup_txt: Crazy for the Killer Kustard Blueberry. Enjoy a pinch of ripe blueberry sweetness, complemented by our rich vanilla custard

main_text: Take a refreshing dive into our signature Killer Kustard flavor finished with a delightful hint of crisp tangy lemon.
hero_txt: Killer Kustard Lemon E-Liquid by Vapetasia is a lemony version of a kold killin’ classic…
sub_txt: Killer Kustard Lemon by Vapetasia 100ml is a fusion of our signature rich creamy custard and tangy fresh lemon slices. The perfect lemon dessert for any occassion.
popup_txt: Take a refreshing dive into our signature Killer Kustard flavor finished with a delightful hint of crisp tangy lemon.

main_text: We’ve merged the best of both worlds with the creamy Killer Kustard ending with a light and luscious honeydew finish.
hero_txt: Honeydew Killer Kustard E-Liquid by Vapetasia takes the one and only true vanilla custard and tops it with fresh honeydew slices.
sub_txt: This mouth-watering treat has our signature Killer Kustard flavor with just the perfect amount of honeydew sweetness. The light honeydew scent will instantly tantalize your senses and refresh your taste buds at every exhale.
popup_txt: We’ve merged the best of both worlds with the creamy Killer Kustard ending with a light and luscious honeydew finish.

main_text: A relaxing tropical trip with a big ripe juicy pineapple taste cruising with our trademark creaminess!
hero_txt: A relaxing tropical trip with a big ripe juicy pineapple taste cruising with our trademark creaminess!
sub_txt: Bold, juicy pineapple with subtle hints of marshmallow cream will take you on a flavorful journey to a tropical paradise. Let your worries melt away as fresh juicy pineapples, layered with a delicate hint of cream, transport you to your own private Hawaiian vacation. You’ll swear it’s the real thing. Tart, tangy, sweet, and utterly satisfying. If you’re a pineapple lover, this is the vape you’ve been looking for.
popup_txt: A relaxing tropical trip with a big ripe juicy pineapple taste cruising with our trademark creaminess!

main_text: Rainbow Road is a fruity fruit cereal that has been steeping in milk, but not long enough to get all soggy. The inhale will be a fruity cereal delight. The exhale will be a milky cream dream.
hero_txt: Taste every color with Rainbow Road. The perfect combination of sweet berry cereal and fresh milk that will leave you wanting more!
sub_txt: A classic combination of Saturday morning breakfast cereal and milk topped with fresh berries. True to its name this vape takes you on a colorful journey starting with the essence of iconic fruity breakfast cereal. Citrus and berries burst across your tongue finishing with a creamy cloud of sweetened milk as you exhale.
popup_txt: Taste every color with Rainbow Road. The perfect combination of sweet berry cereal and fresh milk that will leave you wanting more!

main_text: Milk Of The Poppy is a smooth mixture of strawberries and dragon fruit covered in sweet cream. The inhale will be a magical journey to strawberry land. The exhale will be a tongue magic carpet ride to dragon fruit cream land.
hero_txt: Milk of the Poppy is an addictive mixture of sweet strawberries, a breath of dragon fruit, and a velvety cream.
sub_txt: A velvety blend of strawberries and dragon fruit mixed with cream that can become highly addictive. Milk of the Poppy is a gourmet e-liquid that skillfully combines the bold sweetness of ripe strawberries, a subtle breath of dragon fruit, and our signature creaminess in every cloud that dances off the tongue.
popup_txt: Milk of the Poppy is an addictive mixture of sweet strawberries, a breath of dragon fruit, and a velvety cream.

main_text: Hints of rich custard, sweet hazelnuts, and creamy vanilla forged boldly with a mild tobacco flavor. Our Royalty II Gourmet E-Liquid is an exceptional flavor and favored above all others in our lineup.
hero_txt: Enjoy one of our most unique flavors. Royalty Two has hints of rich custard, sweet nuts, and a creamy vanilla forged boldy with a mild tobacco flavor.
sub_txt: Hints of rich custard, sweet hazelnuts, and creamy vanilla forged boldly with a mild tobacco flavor. Our Royalty Two Gourmet E-Liquid is an exceptional flavor and favored above all others in our lineup. With each dignified inhale you’ll find complex and unique notes of custard, hazelnuts, and vanilla melding together with a mild tobacco flavor, that is sure to please the most discerning of palates. Upon exhale, you’ll meet the most splendid creamy flavors. This magnificent blend is ideal for all vapers in the land.
popup_txt: Enjoy one of our most unique flavors. Royalty Two has hints of rich custard, sweet nuts, and a creamy vanilla forged boldy with a mild tobacco flavor!

main_text: Chill out with this relaxing tropical trip! A mix of ripe juicy pineapple and the chilling coolness of menthol combine for a flavor that will whisk you away to frozen paradise!.
hero_txt: Chill out with this relaxing tropical trip! A mix of ripe juicy pineapple and the chilling coolness of menthol combine for a flavor that will whisk you away to frozen paradise!
sub_txt: Chill out with this relaxing tropical trip! A mix of ripe juicy pineapple and the chilling coolness of menthol combine for a flavor that will whisk you away to frozen paradise!
popup_txt: Chill out with this relaxing tropical trip! A mix of ripe juicy pineapple and the chilling coolness of menthol combine for a flavor that will whisk you away to frozen paradise!

main_text: A unique combination of ice-cold strawberries blended with the chilling breath of dragon fruit for that perfect mix of fire and ice!
hero_txt: A unique combination of ice-cold strawberries blended with the chilling breath of dragon fruit for that perfect mix of fire and ice!
sub_txt: ICED Milk of the Poppy E-liquid 60ml by Vapetasia blends ripe strawberries and a chilling breath of dragon fruit with an ice-cold freeze. A chilling twist on the classic strawberry vape that unites a cooling tangy and sweet flavor profile into one amazing flavor profile! A smooth vape experience you won’t find anywhere else! ICED Milk of the Poppy E-liquid 60ml by Vapetasia is available in 0mg, 3mg, and 6mg nicotine options. 70VG / 30PG Blend.
popup_txt: A unique combination of ice-cold strawberries blended with the chilling breath of dragon fruit for that perfect mix of fire and ice!

main_text: Vapetasia’s Blackberry Lemonade is a lively blend of sweet blackberries and tangy lemons. A winning combination that creates a delicious, refreshing, and unique lemonade flavor profile
hero_txt: Vapetasia’s Blackberry Lemonade is a lively blend of sweet blackberries and tangy lemons. A winning combination that creates a delicious, refreshing, and unique lemonade flavor profile
sub_txt: Vapetasia Blackberry Lemonade create a more complex sweet-tart flavor profile which is combined with the classic sweetness of lemonade that’s sure to refresh your senses. Just as the old adage says, darker berries result in a sweet-tart flavor profile. With this in mind we’ve made an invigorating blend of lemons and blackberries for a vibrantly tasty, tangy, yet smooth vaping experience. Succulent blackberries create a more complex lemonade with the perfect sweetness that’s sure to refresh your senses and revitalize the soul! Your all-time favorite drink now comes in an e-liquid form!
popup_txt: Vapetasia’s Blackberry Lemonade is a lively blend of sweet blackberries and tangy lemons. A winning combination that creates a delicious, refreshing, and unique lemonade flavor profile

main_text: Refreshing lemonade and sweet blackberry puree combined with the icy chill of menthol for a satisfying cool breeze you just can’t put down!
hero_txt: Refreshing lemonade and sweet blackberry puree combined with the icy chill of menthol for a satisfying cool breeze you just can’t put down!
sub_txt: Refreshing lemonade and sweet blackberry puree combined with the icy chill of menthol for a satisfying cool breeze you just can’t put down!

main_text: Vapetasia’s Pink Lemonade is a perfect blend of traditional lemonade with sweet, fresh raspberries. A refreshing lemonade ejuice flavor that hits the spot on those hot summer days.
hero_txt: Vapetasia’s Pink Lemonade is a perfect blend of traditional lemonade with sweet, fresh raspberries. A refreshing lemonade ejuice flavor that hits the spot on those hot summer days.
sub_txt: Vapetasia Pink Lemonade is tangy, tart and delightfully sweet that invigorates with each exhale of a juicy lemon. We specialize in flavors that never get old… The classics! Our Vapetasia Pink Lemonade is the flavor that’s tangy, tart and perfectly sweet. On inhale you’re met with a delightful sweetness that foreshadows the invigorating exhale of a robust, juicy lemon! So reach for Pink Lemonade after those long days, because your taste buds deserve it and so do you!
popup_txt: Vapetasia Pink Lemonade is tangy, tart and delightfully sweet that invigorates with each exhale of a juicy lemon. We specialize in flavors that never get old… The classics! Our Vapetasia Pink Lemonade is the flavor that’s tangy, tart and perfectly sweet.
